articles.title: Raptors fall just short in 106-103 loss to Nuggets
articles.description: Peyton Watson scored a team-high 24 points for the Denver Nuggets, and Brandon Ingram countered with a game-high 30 as the Nikola Jokic-less Nuggets handed the Toronto Raptors a 106-103 loss on Wednesday.

articles.title: Winnipeg Jets’ disastrous December ends with 2-1 defeat in Detroit
articles.description: Logan Stanley scored his seventh of the season but that's all the Jets could muster as they finished the month with just two wins in 13 games.

articles.title: Shooters target homes in Surrey, B.C., with police linking one attack to extortion
articles.description: Police in Surrey, B.C., are investigating after two homes were shot at this week, with one believed to be linked to extortion.

articles.title: Disney worker hurt stopping 180-kg fake boulder from hitting audience
articles.description: The worker is "recovering" after he was seen on video being knocked off his feet by the 400-lb (180kg) rubber Indiana Jones prop.

articles.title: Toronto caregiver wanted by police after vulnerable adults at group home allegedly assaulted
articles.description: Toronto police investigators alleged the incidents happened between Nov. 1 and 30. The accused is wanted for seven counts of assault.

articles.title: Grand Minuit: Montrealers prepare to welcome the New Year
articles.description: Montrealers are gathering at the Old Port to ring in 2026 as Le Grand Minuit turns New Year’s Eve into a night of music, lights, and winter fun. Crowds of all ages are enjoying the festive atmosphere, with families, friends, and visitors exploring light displays, taking photos, and enjoying the sigh
